rules: Rule1: If GlobalTech develops an AI harvesting system, then GlobalTech implements the AI harvesting system in the California region.
Rule2: If GlobalTech implements the AI harvesting system in the California region, then GlobalTech maintains its regional supply chain.
Rule3: The California region experiences drought conditions or the California region experiences labor shortages.
Rule4: If the California region experiences labor shortages, then GlobalTech maintains its regional supply chain.
Rule5: If GlobalTech delays AI system deployment, then GlobalTech increases its manual labor force.

Rule6: If GlobalTech has a contingency planning policy, then should GlobalTech developing an AI harvesting system fail to result in GlobalTech maintaining its regional supply chain, GlobalTech delays AI system deployment.
Rule7: If GlobalTech developing an AI harvesting system fails to cause GlobalTech maintaining its regional supply chain, then GlobalTech does not increase its manual labor force.
Rule8: If the California region experiencing drought conditions does not lead to GlobalTech maintaining its regional supply chain, then GlobalTech imports produce from Mexico.
facts: Fact1: GlobalTech develops an AI harvesting system.
Fact2: GlobalTech has a contingency planning policy.
Fact3: GlobalTech does not import produce from Mexico.

question: GlobalTech maintains its regional supply chain.
